content.raw: I didn't implement the conversion approach so I don't have numbers. It started looking troublesome when I was looking into publishing [ignitiion::msgs::PointCloudColor](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/132), then converting to `sensor_msgs::PointCloud` (since the 2 messages are analogous) and then converting that to `sensor_msgs::PointCloud2`, which is the more modern and efficient format that users are expecting.
content.html: I didn't implement the conversion approach so I don't have numbers. It started looking troublesome when I was looking into publishing ignitiion::msgs::PointCloudColor, then converting to sensor_msgs::PointCloud (since the 2 messages are analogous) and then converting that to sensor_msgs::PointCloud2, which is the more modern and efficient format that users are expecting.
